adjective.definition: Expressed in writing rather than speech.

verb.definition: Mark (letters, words, or other symbols) on a surface, typically paper, with a pen, pencil, or similar implement.
verb.example: He wrote his name on the paper.

verb.definition: Compose, write, and send (a letter) to someone.

noun.definition: The activity or skill of marking coherent words on paper and composing text.
Something written, especially a literary composition.

usage_examples: The agreement was written in English.
